content: FYI, I added a step to the new resource to cover adding the resource to the status-codes spreadsheet here: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Guide_to_Authoring_Resources#Creating_a_new_resource

I also think the first sentence in the Background uses "camel case" incorrectly. I think it should say: "All FHIR resources have both a lower case name [name] and a Pascal-case name [Name]." Any objections to me making that change?
